<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/veii">VEII</a> - This namespace holds all of the Aurora <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ve">VE</a> target-specific per-instruction flags. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/veii">VEII</a> - This namespace holds all of the Aurora <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ve">VE</a> target-specific per-instruction flags.

These must match the corresponding definitions in VEInstrFormats.td.

<SectionDefinition>

<EnumerationListItem name="VE_VLInUse">
VE&#95;VLInUse - This instruction has a vector register in its operands (= 0x2)

VE&#95;VLMask/Shift - This is a bitmask that selects the index number where an instruction holds vector length informatio (0 to 6, 7 means undef).n (= 2)
